actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the Postal Service from providing photocopying equipment for public use in postal facilities.

summary.text: Prohibits the Postal Service from providing photocopying or similar equipment for public use in postal facilities. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 404(b)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the Postal Service from providing photocopying equipment for public use in postal facilities.
